characteristic.__text: When players are alternating picking units to use a **^^Fight^^** ability, when it is your turn to pick a unit, you can pick 2 units instead of 1. Resolve the second **^^Fight^^** ability immediately after the first.
Your Shooting Phase
You can only use this ability if you have not used any **^^Facet of War^^** abilities this battle round. Pick up to 3 friendly **^^Hurakan^^** units that are not in combat to be the targets.
Each target can move a distance up to its Move characteristic. It cannot move into combat during any part of that move, and it cannot use **^^Shoot^^** abilities for the rest of the turn.
**^^Facet of War^^**
Start of Battle Round
You can only use this ability if you have not used any **^^Facet of War^^** abilities this battle round. Pick a friendly **^^Vanari^^** unit to be the target.
The target’s attacks score critical hits on unmodified hit rolls of 5+ for the rest of the battle round.
**^^Facet of War^^**
Start of Battle Round

You can only use this ability if you have not used any **^^Facet of War^^** abilities this battle round.
Add 1 to casting rolls for friendly **^^Scinari^^** units for the rest of the battle round.
**^^Facet of War^^**
Start of Battle Round

You can only use this ability if you have not used any **^^Facet of War^^** abilities this battle round.
Subtract 1 from the Rend characteristic of weapons used for attacks that target friendly **^^Alarith^^** units for the rest of the battle round.
**^^Facet of War^^**
Start of Battle Round

You can only use this ability if you have not used any **^^Facet of War^^** abilities this battle round.
For the rest of the battle round, subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks that target friendly **^^Vanari^^** units that have not charged this turn and that have not been picked as the target of the ‘Power of Hysh’ ability this battle round.
**^^Facet of War^^**
If this unit is not a Wizard, it has **^^Wizard (1)^^**. Otherwise, add 1 to this unit’s power level.
Once Per Battle, Your Movement Phase
Remove this unit from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

If this unit would be destroyed, before removing it from play, roll a dice. On a 3+, this unit is not destroyed and any remaining damage points inflicted on it have no effect. Then, **Heal (1)** this unit. This unit cannot use this ability again for the rest of the battle.
You can use the ‘Power of Hysh’ ability in addition to the other **^^Facet of War^^** ability used during the battle round
You can use the ‘Deep Thinkers’ ability in addition to the other **^^Facet of War^^** ability used during the battle round.
You can use the ‘Enduring as Rock’ ability in addition to the other **^^Facet of War^^** ability used during the battle round.
You can use the ‘Move Like the Wind’ ability in addition to the other **^^Facet of War^^** ability used during the battle round.
Once Per Battle, Reaction: You declared the ‘Charge’ ability or a **^^Spell^^** ability for this unit
You can re-roll the charge roll or casting roll for that ability.
Reaction: You declared the ‘Redeploy’ command for a friendly **^^Lumineth Realm‑lords^^** unit wholly within 12" of this unit
If you roll a 1-3 when determining the distance that unit can move, you can use a value of 4 instead.
Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
Inflict D3+3 mortal damage on the target.
Your Hero Phase

If there is not a friendly **Sanctum of Amyntok** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **^^Lumineth Realm‑lords Wizard^^** to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly **^^Lumineth Realm‑lords Infantry Hero^^** wholly within 12" of them and more than 3" from all other units and terrain features to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.

Set up a **Sanctum of Amyntok** within the target’s combat range, visible to the caster and not in combat. A **Sanctum of Amyntok** has 3 parts that must be set up touching each other so that they form a ring with the target inside.
Your Hero Phase
If there is not a friendly **Rune of Petrification** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **^^Lumineth Realm‑lords Wizard^^** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Set up a **Rune of Petrification** wholly within 18" of the caster and visible to them.
Your Hero Phase
If there is not a friendly **Hyshian Twinstones** endless spell on the battlefield, pick a friendly **^^Lumineth Realm‑lords Wizard^^** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Set up a **Hyshian Twinstones** endless spell wholly within 6" of the caster
Your Hero Phase

Pick a friendly **^^Lumineth Realm‑lords Wizard^^** to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly **^^Lumineth Realm‑lords^^** unit wholly within 18" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Add 4" to the target’s Move characteristic until the start of your next turn.
**^^Spell^^**, **^^Unlimited^^**
Your Hero Phase
Pick a friendly **^^Lumineth Realm‑lords Wizard^^** to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Halve the target’s Move characteristic until the start of your next turn, then roll a dice. If the roll equals or exceeds the target’s Save characteristic, inflict D3 mortal damage on it.
Your Hero Phase
Pick a friendly **^^Lumineth Realm‑lords Wizard^^** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Until the start of your next turn, friendly units have **^^Ward (5+)^^** while they are wholly within 12" of the caster.

entryLink._name: Archmage Teclis and Celennar, Spirit of Hysh
Sevireth, Lord of the Seventh Wind
Archmage Teclis and Celennar, Spirit of Hysh
Sevireth, Lord of the Seventh Wind
